column3: Latest;Kampong Cham: Reports say that a French medical volunteer working in Kampong Cham province has recently died.------Dr. Patrick
column4: as he has been named on social media
column5: was on a mission to provide treatment for the poor in the province
column6: when he suddenly became ill. He later died in Kampong Cham Provincial Hospital of suspected heart failure.------Among those to give tribute was Kampong Cham Governor HE KUOCH Chamroeun
column7: who attended a ceremony and expressed his condolences.
